summary.purpose: Manages Redis-based real-time data synchronisation: bulk loads collection data from Redis on startup and handles ongoing add/update/delete events from Redis pub/sub messages.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a lower-latency alternative to Firestore snapshot listeners by reading and subscribing to Redis-cached data, with fallback to Firestore when Redis is unavailable or not configured for a collection.

external.name: akeyless-types-commons
external.why_used: Provides CollectionConfig, RedisUpdatePayload, RedisUpdateType, and TObject types.

external.name: firebase-admin
external.why_used: Imports Timestamp from firebase-admin/firestore for converting Redis-stored timestamp objects back to Firestore Timestamps.

internal.why_used: Imports get_redis_commander, get_redis_listener, redis_commander_connected, and redis_listener_connected to check connection status and access clients.
Imports get_nx_settings (to read cache_collections_config), parse_add_update_as_array, parse_add_update_as_object, parse_delete_as_array, parse_delete_as_object, and snapshot (for Firebase fallback).
Imports get_collection_keys and scan_redis_keys for loading initial collection data.
Imports the logger singleton for warning and error logging.

exports.name: redis_snapshots_bulk
exports.description_one_line: Bulk-initialises Redis snapshot listeners for a list of OnSnapshotConfig objects, with per-collection fallback to Firestore.

symbols.name: redis_snapshots_bulk
symbols.description_one_line: Bulk-initialises Redis snapshot listeners for a list of OnSnapshotConfig objects, with per-collection fallback to Firestore.

params.name: configs
params.description: Array of snapshot configurations, one per collection to subscribe.

returns.description: Resolves after all collections are initialised (either from Redis or via Firestore fallback).

details.what_it_does: For each config, calls validate_config to check Redis connection status, whether both clients are connected, whether the collection is configured in nx-settings cache_collections_config, and whether it has a valid sync_direction. On validation failure, optionally triggers a Firebase snapshot fallback. On success, calls parse_redis_snapshot to perform initial bulk load from Redis. Also registers a persistent 'pmessage' handler on the Redis listener to handle subsequent add/update/delete events from Redis pub/sub, dispatching each update to the appropriate parsers.
side_effects: Reads all Redis keys for each collection using SCAN + MGET.
Populates cache_manager with initial collection data.
Registers a persistent 'pmessage' event handler on the Redis listener for ongoing updates.
May trigger Firestore snapshot listeners as fallback.

error_cases.condition: Redis commander or listener not connected
error_cases.behavior: Logs a warning and falls back to Firebase snapshot for the affected collection.

error_cases.condition: Collection not in cache_collections_config or sync_direction is redis_to_firebase
error_cases.behavior: Logs a warning and falls back to Firebase snapshot.
Skips the duplicate without triggering a fallback.

minimal_correct.title: Bulk initialise Redis snapshots

known_gaps: Internal helpers validate_config, parse_redis_snapshot, get_collection_data, convert_object_timestamps, and default_parsers are private and not documented as they are not exported.
